function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential violation of social distancing norms due to close proximity of pedestrians","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement strict monitoring and enforcement of social distancing regulations","Technologies":"Computer vision for real-time pedestrian tracking and alert generation","People":"Pedestrians in crowded areas","Owner":"Local authorities and law enforcement agencies"},{"Description":"Inaccurate pedestrian detection and distance calculation","Impact":"False alerts and misidentification of safe areas","Mitigation":"Regular calibration and validation of object detection models","Technologies":"Machine learning for model training and validation","People":"Users and developers of the surveillance framework","Owner":"Research and development organizations"},{"Description":"Reliance on public dataset for evaluation","Impact":"Potential biases and limited representation of diverse environments","Mitigation":"Supplement dataset with additional diverse video data for comprehensive evaluation","Technologies":"Data augmentation and collection tools for diverse environments","People":"Research and development organizations","Owner":"Public and private research institutions"}]}
